subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As Jason Kidd was helping the Eastern Conference win the All-Star game, the Nets and the Mavericks were busily reconstructing a trade that would place Kidd in Dallas when the regular season resumes.
snippet: As Jason Kidd was helping the Eastern Conference win the All-Star game, the Nets and the Mavericks were busily reconstructing a trade that would place Kidd in Dallas when the regular season resumes.
